Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Forest Park due to signal a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Forest Park due to signal a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
